grid_data.help: ========================================= GRID naming convention ========================================= The long grid name has the order atm,lnd,ocn/ice,river,mask,glc The following shortname is used a% => atm, l% => lnd, oi% => ocn/ice, r% => river, m% => mask, g% => glc, w% => wav The notation is a%name_l%name_oi%name_r%name_m%mask_g%name_w%name Each grid is associated with three required elements and one optional element longname (a%name_l%name_oi%name_r%name_m%mask_g%name_w%name) shortname (for backwards compatibility) alias (even shorter notation than shortname) (optional) support (Description of the support level for this grid) (optional) Each grid can also be associated with the following optional attributes compset (Regular expression for compsets that are required to match for this grid) (optional)

grid.support: Non-standard grid for testing of the interpolation in DATM rather than coupler
Non-standard grid for running POP in true 1D mode
Non-standard grid, for testing high resolution RTM grid
Non-standard grid, for testing high resolution RTM grid

domain.name: 01col
domain.desc: 01col is a single-column grid for datm and POP:

domain.name: CLM_USRDAT
domain.desc: user specified domain - only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.desc: 1x1 Numa Iowa -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.desc: 1x1 Brazil -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.desc: 1x1 Smallville Iowa Crop Test Case -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.desc: 1x1 Camden New Jersey -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.name: 1x1_mexicocityMEX

domain.name: 1x1_vancouverCAN
domain.desc: 1x1 Vancouver Canada -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.name: 1x1_tropicAtl
domain.desc: 1x1 Tropical Atlantic Test Case -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.name: 1x1_urbanc_alpha
domain.desc: 1x1 Urban C Alpha Test Case -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.name: 5x5_amazon
domain.desc: 5x5 Amazon regional case -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.name: 360x720cru
domain.desc: Exact half-degree CRUNCEP datm forcing grid with CRUNCEP land-mask -- only valid for DATM/CLM compset

domain.name: T341
domain.support: Backward compatible for very high resolution Spectral-dycore experiments

domain.name: T85
domain.support: Backward compatible for high resolution Spectral-dycore experiments

domain.name: ne16np4
domain.support: For low resolution spectral element grid testing

domain.name: ne240np4
domain.support: Experimental for very high resolution experiments

domain.name: gx1v6
domain.desc: gx1v6 is displaced Greenland pole v6 1-deg grid:

domain.name: gx3v7
domain.desc: gx3v7 is displaced Greenland pole v7 3-deg grid:

domain.name: tx1v1
domain.desc: tripole v1 1-deg grid: testing proxy for high-res tripole ocean grids- do not use for scientific experiments

domain.name: mpas120
domain.desc: mpas120 is a MPAS ocean grid that is roughly 1 degree resolution:

domain.name: rx1
domain.desc: rx1 is 1 degree river routing grid (only valid for DROF):
domain.support: Can only be used by DROF

domain.name: r05
domain.desc: r05 is 1/2 degree river routing grid:

domain.name: r01
domain.desc: r01 is 1/10 degree river routing grid:
domain.support: For experimental use by high resolution grids

domain.name: mp120v1
domain.desc: mp120v1 is a MPAS ocean grid that is roughly 1 degree resolution:

domain.name: oQU120
domain.desc: oQU120 is a MPAS ocean grid that is roughly 1 degree resolution:

domain.name: gland5
domain.desc: 5-km Greenland grid (OLD VERSION: Generally use gland5UM instead)

domain.name: gland5UM
domain.desc: 5-km Greenland grid (new version from U. Montana)

domain.name: gland4
domain.desc: 4-km Greenland grid, for use with the glissade dycore

domain.name: ww3a
